snippet: The International Criminal Court issued an arrest warrant on Thursday for Abdel Rahim Muhammad Hussein as part of investigations into atrocities in Darfur.
abstract: International Criminal Court issues an arrest warrant for the Sudanese defense minister, Abdel Rahim Muhammad Hussein, as part of investigations into atrocities in Darfur.
lead_paragraph: The International Criminal Court issued an arrest warrant on Thursday for Abdel Rahim Muhammad Hussein as part of investigations into atrocities in Darfur.

headline.main: Sudan: Court Issues Warrant for Defense Minister
headline.print_headline: Sudan: Court Issues Warrant for Defense Minister

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject
